attributes.action: Bring back coursework to GCSEs and A levels!!
attributes.additional_details: Mental health issues are slowly rising in teenagers and all of this pressure of exams is not helping. What happens if the day of your exam you are ill or not feeling your best? Then your full 2 years of work is worthless!
attributes.background: The government needs to bring back coursework for GCSEs and A levels. This needs to happen because students are under so much pressure with exams they can’t possibly remember everything over 2 years! This will help improve the lives of many students who struggle with memory and life.
